54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Jabir reported:I was in the house of 'Abdullah b. Mas'ud and the house was fully packed that a red storm blew in Kufah

chapter.ara-name: باب إِقْبَالِ الرُّومِ فِي كَثْرَةِ الْقَتْلِ عِنْدَ خُرُوجِ الدَّجَّالِ
chapter.eng-name: Fighting The Byzantines, And A Great Deal Of Killing When Ad-Dajjal Emerges
